articles.title: iPhone 15 Pro models tipped to get next-gen A17 Bionic with 6-core GPU under the hood - HT Tech
articles.description: The high-end models of the iPhone 15 series could feature a next-generation A17 Bionic chipset with an upgraded GPU. What does this mean in terms of performance and battery life? Read on to find out.
